articles.title: About
articles.contents:
My name is Miha Gazvoda and I work as a data scientist at Outfit7 (Ekipa2 d.o.o. subsidiary) in Ljubljana, Slovenia. I love outdoor sports - cycling is my favorite. During my early student years, I was a semi-professional poker player and won a Slovenian poker championship (team event) in 2014. I can’t say no to a non-fiction book that arouses my curiosity. And I can’t say no to an excuse not to write. I’m trying to fix that - right here, right now.

\(\bullet\bullet\bullet\)

This blog is a collection of my data science side projects, topics that interest me, and personal stories I want to share. It’s built with Distill and deployed using Netlify. My logo (on upper-left corner) was created by Jovana Đukić.

miha_gazvoda_website
Use rmarkdown::render_site() to build the whole site. It’s also possible to knit the separate articles that are in _posts folder.
